name: Johnny Forever: Keeping it PG
description:
The Johnny fangame that has been in planning for 2 years!

Controlls 

arrows to steer. Up is jump space is shrink and CRTL is shoot

Have Fun CHUMPS!

Download the .exe for the installer OR if you dont want to install, Download the ZIP

Oh and tell me if you find any GAME BREAKING GLICHES, thanks!

Dont believe the help menu, IT LIES!
